attributes.action: use his position to convince Enfield Council and the Notting Hill Housing Trust that money allocated by Government to these bodies for the North Circular Road redevelopment project should benefit local residents through the creation of public (commmunity and green) spaces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Planners working on the upcoming redevelopment of the A406 as it passes through London Borough of Enfield must reserve public spaces along the route to create a  greener environment where communities can thrive.
